item.title: ST-Julia-IDE
item.description: Sometimes, I am asked how to set up a simple julia IDE for people who are already using Sublime Text. It is simple in theory but many things can go wrong, so I thought this document could be useful. I try to provide step by step instructions as much as possible. Feel free to email me if some of the steps were not as clear as you would have liked.
